content: If you want to renew an automatic login using {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, you will be asked to grant access to your {{productName}} account data.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the action of revoking consent for automatic login access to account data in a product. When used in a RevokeDialog, it appears as a message explaining why user consent needs to be granted again for renewal, prompting users to authorize data access for their account.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'account data' is not precise. 'Профила ви' (your profile) is closer to 'account details' or 'account information' but misses the nuance of 'data'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако искате да подновите автоматичното влизане с помощта на {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, ще трябва да предоставите достъп до данните от вашия {{productName}} акаунт.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "χρησιμοποιώντας το {{productName}} της {{organizationName}}" is awkward and doesn't accurately reflect "using {{organizationName}} {{productName}}". It implies the product is *of* the organization, rather than using it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν θέλετε να ανανεώσετε μια αυτόματη σύνδεση χρησιμοποιώντας το {{organizationName}} και το {{productName}}...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "{{productName}}" at the end of the sentence is redundant and stylistically incorrect. It feels unnatural in Greek.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν θέλετε να ανανεώσετε μια αυτόματη σύνδεση χρησιμοποιώντας το {{organizationName}} και το {{productName}}...θα σας ζητηθεί να χορηγήσετε πρόσβαση στα δεδομένα του λογαριασμού σας.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Jos haluat uusia automaattisen kirjautumisen" is not the most natural way to express "If you want to renew an automatic login." A better translation would convey the intention of reactivating or re-establishing the automatic login.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos haluat aktivoida uudelleen automaattisen kirjautumisen...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "մուտք գործել ձեր {{productName}} հաշվի տվյալները" translates to "access your {{productName}} account data" which isn't quite accurate. The English implies granting access, not 'logging in' to the data. It's suggesting that the user needs to *authorize* or *approve* the data access again.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Եթե ցանկանում եք թարմացնել ավտոմատ մուտքը՝ օգտագործելով {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, ձեզանից կպահանջվի թույլտվություն տալ ձեր {{productName}} հաշվի տվյալներին:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '을/를' is used as a particle to indicate the object of a verb or noun. In this context, it creates an awkward phrasing. While grammatically not incorrect, it sounds less natural than a more direct phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing '을/를' for a smoother read. For example: "{{organizationName}} {{productName}}을 사용하는 자동 로그인을 갱신하려면..." or "{{organizationName}} {{productName}}을 통해 자동 로그인을 갱신하려면..."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຖ້າທ່ານຕ້ອງການຕໍ່ນະໃສ່" translates to "If you want to continue" which doesn't fully capture the meaning of "renew". A more accurate translation for 'renew' would be something along the lines of 'ສ້າງໃໝ່ອີງຕາມ' or 'ປັບປຸງ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າທ່ານຕ້ອງການສ້າງໃໝ່ອີງຕາມການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບອັດຕະໂນມັດໂດຍໃຊ້...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "ທ່ານຈະຖືກກ່າວວ່າຕ້ອງໃຫ້ການອະນຸຍາດ" is somewhat awkward and passive. It could be phrased more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານຈະຕ້ອງໃຫ້ການອະນຸຍາດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "zostaniesz poproszony(na)" is grammatically awkward. The choice between masculine ("poproszony") and feminine ("poproszona") depends on the assumed gender of the user, which isn't clear. Using a gender-neutral construction would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeśli chcesz odnowić automatyczne logowanie przy użyciu {{productName}} {{organizationName}}, zostaniesz poproszony o przyznanie dostępu do danych Twojego konta {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "cu ajutorul" (with the help of) in the Romanian translation sounds slightly awkward and isn't the most natural way to express renewing an automatic login. It implies the login is being assisted by the organization and product, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă doriți să reînnoiți autentificarea automată pentru {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, vi se va cere să acordați accesul la datele contului dvs. {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ඔබ {{organizationName}} {{productName}} භාවිතයෙන් ස්වයංක්‍රීය உள்ප්‍රවේශය අලුතින් සකසන්නට අවශ්‍ය නම්" is a bit verbose and could be simplified. It translates to 'If you need to renew an automatic login using {{organizationName}} {{productName}}'. A more natural Sinhala phrasing might be 'ඔබ {{organizationName}} {{productName}} භාවිතයෙන් ස්වයංක්‍රීය உள்ප්‍රවේශය නැවත සකසන්නට අවශ්‍ය නම්' (If you need to re-establish an automatic login...).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ {{organizationName}} {{productName}} භාවිතයෙන් ස්වයංක්‍රීය உள்ප්‍රවේශය නැවත සකසන්නට අවශ්‍ය නම්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'ඉල්ලීමක් කෙරේ' translates to 'a request will be made.' This is somewhat formal and indirect. A more direct and common phrasing would be better. For example, 'ඔබට දැනුම් දෙනු ලැබේ' (you will be informed) or 'ඔබගෙන් ඉල්ලුම් කෙරේ' (we request from you).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගෙන් ඉල්ලුම් කෙරේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the variables {{organizationName}} and {{productName}} are present, ensure that the overall style and consistency regarding variable usage is maintained throughout the entire localized application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify consistency with variable usage throughout all Sinhala translations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation of "renew" is not accurately reflected. "Obnoviti" implies restoring something that was previously in place, but "renew" in this context refers to re-granting permission, not restoring a previous state.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrase like "ponovno aktivirati" (reactivate) or "ponovno pridobiti" (reobtain) instead of "obnoviti" to better convey the meaning of re-granting access.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "podatkov računa {{productName}}" is slightly awkward. It literally translates to "account data {{productName}}", implying the data *is* the product name, which isn't the intended meaning. It should be more clearly tied to the 'account'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider phrasing it as "podatkov vašega računa {{productName}}" (data of your {{productName}} account).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation lacks the use of double curly braces for the variables, which were present in the English original. This makes it unclear that 'organizationName' and 'productName' are placeholders.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако желите да обновите аутоматску пријаву користећи {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, од вас ће се тражити да одобрите приступ подацима вашег {{productName}} налога.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "renew" is not ideal. "Відновити" implies a restoration to a previous state, which isn't exactly what's happening. It's more about re-authorizing access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Якщо ви захочете оновити автоматичний вхід за допомогою {{productName}} {{organizationName}}, вам буде запропоновано надати доступ до даних вашого облікового запису {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'renew an automatic login' is not accurately translated. 'Gia hạn' implies renewal or extension, but in this context, it sounds awkward. A better translation would convey the action of re-granting access or re-establishing the login.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn muốn thiết lập lại đăng nhập tự động sử dụng {{productName}} {{organizationName}}, bạn sẽ được yêu cầu cấp quyền truy cập vào dữ liệu tài khoản {{productName}} của mình.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The usage of 'cấp quyền truy cập' is technically correct, but sounds formal and bureaucratic. A more natural way to express granting access is to use a more colloquial phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn muốn thiết lập lại đăng nhập tự động sử dụng {{productName}} {{organizationName}}, bạn sẽ được yêu cầu cho phép truy cập vào dữ liệu tài khoản {{productName}} của mình.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "续订自动登录" (xùdìng zìdòng dēnglùn) which translates to 'renew automatic login' feels unnatural in this context. A more natural phrasing would be something like '重新启用自动登录' (chóngxīn yǐnqián zìdòng dēnglùn) or '重新设置自动登录' (chóngxīn shèzhì zìdòng dēnglùn).  The original English implies regaining access or re-establishing, not literally 'renewing'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 如果您想通过{{organizationName}} {{productName}}重新启用自动登录，您需要授权您的{{productName}}帐户数据的访问权限。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "帐户数据的访问权限" (kuǎn zhàng shùjù de fǎngwèn quánxiàn) is a bit formal and clunky. A more conversational and understandable phrasing would be "您的{{productName}}帐户数据的使用权限" (nín de {{productName}} kuǎn zhàng shùjù de shǐyòng quánxiàn) or simply "您的{{productName}}帐户数据" (nín de {{productName}} kuǎn zhàng shùjù) depending on the desired level of formality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 如果您想通过{{organizationName}} {{productName}}重新启用自动登录，您需要授权您的{{productName}}帐户数据。
